abstract: Television documentary series Bomb Patrol: Afghanistan, which is premiering on G4 channel, is reminder of how television has struggled to successfully portray battlefields of Iraq and Afghanistan.
snippet: Television has lagged behind film in showing the battlefields of Iraq and Afghanistan. The latest offering, “Bomb Patrol: Afghanistan,” begins on Tuesday night on the G4 cable channel.
lead_paragraph: Television has lagged behind film in showing the battlefields of Iraq and Afghanistan. The latest offering, “Bomb Patrol: Afghanistan,” begins on Tuesday night on the G4 cable channel.

headline.main: TV Struggles to Bring War Zones to Americans
headline.print_headline: TV Struggles To Bring War Zones To Americans
headline.seo: Television Still Struggles to Bring War Zones Home
